E-LEARNING MANAGEMENT SERVICE

The online e-learning management service industry is a rapidly growing sector that involves the delivery of educational content and training programs through digital platforms.

Also, they provide the infrastructure for delivering, managing, and tracking online courses. They offer features such as course creation, student enrollment, assessments, progress tracking, communication tools, certification, and gamification.

They use CRM, Sales, E-learning, Website, Accounting, Contact, Survey, and E-Commerce Modules.

Setup Business Workflows Flow 1 : Sell your courses online Flow 2 : Offer a Discount and Coupon code for Free Product on Course Flow 3: Learning with assessments and certifications Flow 4 : Build an Online engaged Community

Setup

This Set up Includes

  • Design the website
  • Create and published the course
  • Configure the certification and Gamification
  • Set up the payment acquire

Business Workflows

Flow 1 : Sell your courses online

  • Create a product with product type as "course"
  • Define the course and set the enrollment policy
  • Visit the online shop and select the course
  • Make the payment and enroll in the course

Flow 2 : Offer a Discount and Coupon code for Free Product on Course

  • Set up the price list and promotion program
  • Add the course to the cart
  • Apply the coupon code
  • Make the payment and get the free product

Flow 3: Learning with assessments and certifications

  • Create a course and set the assessment/survey or a live session
  • Set the question and set score for the assessment
  • Start the examination and send certification email if passed
  • Provide badges

Flow 4 : Build an online engaged community

  • Configure the forum settings
  • Set the karma rights and ranks
  • Allow enrollers to ask questions and give answers
  • Set goals and define ranks or badges
